p.s: In the given scene from the feature movie The Hate U Give, which was directed by George Tillmann Jr. and published in 2018, talks about the first introduction of the protagonist's secret boyfriend Chris and how Starr confronts him about a certain conflict they had in the past.
The scene starts with Chris walking through the school hallway and his confidence shining through as he greets his friends left and right.
Starr watches him walk closer and closer to her while she admires his appearance.
When Chris notices her, he walks up to her putting his headphones onto Starr which play his new beats he made for her.
Starr expresses to him that she is still mad/dissapointeddisappointed about what he had did the other day through taking off his headphones and confronting him.
Chris then proceeds to tell her his perspective of the conflict through saying that he tried to get near to her in every way possible but Starr pushing him away with the excuse that she is busy.
He states that he misunderstood the situation completely and expects leniency.
Due to Starr still being thrown off by him he switches themes to his new beat and asks confidently her opinion on it.
After not getting quite the reaction he wanted, he takes off the cable which werewas connected to his headphones and starts dancing in front of the whole school.
